Location:
- Ceiling-mounted wall/room HVAC vent grille (white metal), flush in textured ceiling.

Observations:
- Slotted grille with two mounting screws; damper lever on right edge.
- Dirt/dust on slats and surround; no visible rust or staining on grille or surrounding ceiling.

Potential Issues:
- No visible issues.

Recommendations:
- No actions required; routine cleaning to maintain airflow and indoor air quality.
